title: The Clean, Cold Light of Dalriada Street
tagline: Inheriting a stark tenement flat, a man must clear out a life's clutter to find a space for his own.
themes: The Austere Poetry of the Everyday

chapters.title: The View from the Top Floor
A Smell of Yeast, a Smell of Lavender

story: Write a chapter where Donnie discovers a single, seemingly mundane object in the flat that completely changes his understanding of Aunt Morag.
Compose a monologue from the perspective of the tenement building itself, describing the generations of lives it has contained.
Create a scene where Donnie hosts his first visitor in the flat—who is it, and what awkward or profound moment transpires?
Write a 'found document'—a letter, a shopping list, a court note—from Morag's box that reveals a hidden hope or regret.
technical: Build an interactive map of Dalriada Street and its fictional closes, allowing users to explore the sonic and olfactory atmosphere of each landing.
Create a generative text tool that writes descriptions of Glasgow weather and its effect on the built environment, in the style of the novel's opening.

cover_prompt: A solitary man in a worn sweater carefully places a single, dusty book into a cardboard box, his expression one of pensive focus amidst a sea of sorted possessions, [Detailed Scene & Context: inside a stark, high-ceilinged tenement flat in a Scottish city; the room is a landscape of transition, with stacks of old books, faded photographs in small piles, a simple wooden chair by a large window, and clean, empty spaces beginning to emerge from the clutter, suggesting an urban archaeology in progress], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric style of Andrew Wyeth's melancholic realism and the precise, somber interiors of Vilhelm Hammershøi, rendered in textured oil painting with subtle impasto], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, centered composition with the figure slightly off-center, viewed from a low dramatic angle that emphasizes the tall window and the geometric architecture of the room], [Lighting & Color Palette: cold, clear northern daylight streaming through the bare window, casting long, sharp shadows and illuminating dust motes, creating a stark interplay of light and shadow; a restrained palette of muted greys, oatmeal, faded blues, and bone white, with a single warm accent of ochre from an old book spine], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
